development.prebuildCommand: mkdir -p node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/ && cp -n node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/gradle.properties node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/ || echo 'File already exists'

preview.prebuildCommand: mkdir -p node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/ && cp -n node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/gradle.properties node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/ || echo 'File already exists'

production.prebuildCommand: mkdir -p node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/ && cp -n node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/gradle.properties node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/ || echo 'File already exists'
